{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Bananapi bpir3 prelim.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = Banana Pi BPI R3 SBC |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.banana-pi.org/r3.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Banana_Pi_BPI_R3 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Banana Pi |model = BPI R |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 3 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/31/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Banana_Pi_BPI_R3 |wlclass = AX60002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7986A;Filogic 830; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = MediaTek;MT7531AE; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Bananian;;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, M.2, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SFP, MicroSD Card slot, SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 2 |exp_M.2 = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, SIM Card slot, SFP+ (2.5G), GPIO, SPI, I2C, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SinoVoIP |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android, Ubuntu, Debian, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2022 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0BDG6R41Q |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = MediaTek;MT7975N; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 1148 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = MediaTek;MT7975P; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 4804 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{seealso|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== :'''Banana Pi RPI R3''' board *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986A (''Filogic 830'') :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @2.0GHz *Memory: 2GB DDR3 (shared with GPU) *Storage: MicroSD (TF) Card, SATA 6Gbps, eMMC *Network: 5x 10/100/1000Mbps Ethernet (MT7531AE) *WLAN: 802.11abgn/ac/ax 2.4/5GHz (MT7975N/MT7975P) *USB: 1x USB 3.0 (Host), 2x USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *GPIO: 40-pins header, 26x GPIO, UART, I2C *OS: Android, Ubuntu, Debian, Bananian *Power Source: 12V/2A via DC power
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi ''Banana Pi'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-R3 ''Banana Pi BPI-R3'' on '''Banana Pi''' Wiki]
===News=== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/banana-pi-router-board-features-wifi-6-and-dual-2-5gbe/ ''Banana Pi BPI R3 Board Powered by MediaTek MT7986'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/03/21/banana-pi-bpi-r3-wifi-6e-router-board-MediaTek-filogic830-mt7986-soc/ ''Banana Pi BPI-R3 Board is Powered by MediaTek MT7986'' on '''CNX-Software''']
